wikipedia_page.main: John Wright (4 February 1873 – 1946) was a Scottish footballer who played in the Football League for Bolton Wanderers and The Wednesday, and the Southern League for Plymouth Argyle, Watford and Southend United. He was an inside forward.

response: *Jocky Wright (1873–1946), real name John Wright, Scottish football inside forward for The Wednesday, Plymouth Argyle and others
